title: Dhruv Tara - Samay Sadi Se Pare
overview: Love transcends time when a princess with a secret passion for healing people journeys 400 years in the future in search of a someone who can save her terminal brother. Amidst the wonderous modern world, the princess finds a talented neurosurgeon and, in the process discovers an unlikely bond of love. But will love be enough to compel him to travel to the past and help her and her brother?
